block.p: GILLIATT-Neal. There will be a memorial service on Thursday, September 28, at 4:00 PM at the Second Congregational Church, 139 East Putnam Ave., Greenwich, CT (for directions call 203869-9311). In lieu of flowers, contributions can be made to the Neal Gilliatt Chair in Marketing in care of the Indiana University Foundation, Kelley School of Business, PO Box 500, Bloomington, IN 47401
